content: this 32 x 32 crochet baby waffle blanket was a two nighter project in front of the television to complete direct pdf link 1 it s an easy level project but for absolutely new beginners you may struggle with identifying the chain stitches at the very beginning of the project once the first row across is formed i found this to really be a cinch 1 https //thecrochetcrowd com/wp-content/uploads/2019/01/baby-waffle-blanket pdf
